search-term-groups.description: A feature allowing the grouping of URLs around the search term that it came from.

enabled.description: If true, the feature shows up on the homescreen and on the new tab screen.

default-browser-message.description: A small feature allowing experiments on the placement of a default browser message.

message-location.description: Where is the message to be put.

nimbus-validation.description: A feature that does not correspond to an application feature suitable for showing that Nimbus is working. This should never be used in production.

settings-icon.description: The drawable displayed in the app menu for Settings

settings-punctuation.description: The emoji displayed in the Settings screen title.

settings-title.description: The title of displayed in the Settings screen and app menu.

homescreen.description: The homescreen that the user goes to when they press home or new tab.

sections-enabled.description: This property provides a lookup table of whether or not the given section should be enabled. If the section is enabled, it should be toggleable in the settings screen, and on by default.
